# Introduction {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the Upper Missouri River Basin (UMRB) drought indicators dashboard documentation handbook.

This handbook provides information for all datasets and analysis presented in the UMRB Drought Indicators Dashboard. In short, this handbook will provide information on:

  + 1. Datasets used for drought assessment in the UMRB Drought Dashboard
  + 2. Descriptions of each metric on the dashboard
  + 3. Assumptions regarding dataset calculations and derivation
  + 4. Validation efforts 

This work is supported by a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administrationâ€™s (NOAA) National Integrated Drought Information System (NIDIS) Drought Early Warning System (DEWS). More information on NIDIS and the DEWS program can be found at https://www.drought.gov/drought/what-nidis.
